participant_1.background:
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
i would travel the world if i could.

participant_2.background:
My biggest struggle is trying to find balance between my healthy eating habits and my love of drinking.
my adopted dad works at hp.
I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do outside?
I love going for a run! It's so refreshing and I always feel great afterwards.
That's awesome! I love running too. I always feel like I can conquer the world afterwards.
Me too! I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run.
That's so sweet! I'm sure she'll be happy to see you too.
Yeah, she's the best. She's always there to support me.
That's great! It's important to have a supportive partner.
Yeah, I'm really lucky to have her.
I'm glad to hear that! So, what do you do for a living?
I drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.
That sounds like a fun job! Do you like it?
Yeah, it's great! I get to see a lot of different places and meet new people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
